an4.102:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro valahakupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.102:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita hoti, no vassita?
an4.102:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.102:2.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.102:2.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam nappajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam nappajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.102:2.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita hoti, no vassita.
an4.102:2.6: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako gajjita, no vassita;
an4.102:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo vassita hoti, no gajjita?
an4.102:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammam na pariyapunati—
an4.102:3.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.102:3.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.102:3.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vassita hoti, no gajjita.
an4.102:3.6: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako vassita, no gajjita;
an4.102:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjita hoti, no vassita?
an4.102:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.102:4.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.102:4.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.102:4.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjita hoti, no vassita.
an4.102:4.6: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako neva gajjita, no vassita;
an4.102:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita ca hoti vassita ca?
an4.102:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.102:5.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.102:5.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.102:5.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita ca hoti vassita ca.
an4.102:5.6: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako gajjita ca vassita ca;
an4.102:5.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro valahakupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
